definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: canopy, chamber (as covering, enclosing)—abs. ´[[ח]] Is 4:5; sf. [[תֻפָּתוֹ]] Ps 19:6; [[חֻפָּתָהּ]] Joe 2:16; —
canopy, ´[[על־בל־כּבוד ח]] Is 4:5 over all glory a canopy (for protection).
chamber, of bridegroom Ps 19:6 (metaph. of sunrising); of bride Joe 2:16 (‖[[חֶדֶר]] of bridegroom).
